snippet: Salim Ahmed Hamdan’s conviction for providing material support for terrorism could not stand because, at the time of his actions, there was no such defined war crime, the court found.
lead_paragraph: Salim Ahmed Hamdan’s conviction for providing material support for terrorism could not stand because, at the time of his actions, there was no such defined war crime, the court found.

headline.seo: Appeals Court Overturns Terrorism Conviction of Salim Ahmed Hamdan, Bin Laden’s Driver
headline.main: Appeals Court Overturns Terrorism Conviction of Bin Laden’s Driver
headline.print_headline: Appeals Court Overturns Terrorism Conviction of Bin Laden’s Driver
